title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: Modern AlgebraFinite Fields, construction and examples, polynomials on finite fields and their irreducibility, applications to polynomial coding. Irreducible polynomials over finite fields, factorization of polynomials over finite fields. Combinatorial applications -Hadamard matrices, balanced incomplete block designs. Automata - Semi automata and automata, examples, algorithms and related programs.
